amendment.description: Amendment authorizes an additional $22 million for the endurance unmanned aerial vehicle known as Darkstar. \ As amended by the Combest amendment (A003), language was added requiring that a detailed cost analysis and report on specifically how these funds will be used must be submitted to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize and additional $22 million for the Tier III Minus Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A002) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
